document.full_text: china warned on tuesday that a european draft resolution asking the u.n. security council to condemn syria would not defuse tension in the region, suggesting beijing could block it if it is submitted for a vote.
document.title: eu draft u.n. resolution on syria could hurt stability: china
lines_and_colors: china warned on tuesday that a european draft resolution asking the u.n. security council to condemn syria would not defuse tension in the region, suggesting beijing could block it if it is submitted for a vote.
